DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to characterise which fractionated electrogram morphologies are important to target in the catheter ablation of atrial fibrillation.
DOC.brief_title: Characterisation of Fractionated Electrograms Critical for Maintenance of Atrial Fibrillation (AF)
DOC.criteria: patients with persistent AF listed for first time catheter ablation age < 18 years pregnancy contraindications to procedure recent myocardial infarction, coronary intervention, or cardiac surgery
